title: Use only the uploaded logo across the portal

requirements.summary: Add the uploaded logo JPG as the single source-of-truth static logo asset in frontend public assets.
acceptanceCriteria: The file exists at frontend/public/assets/generated/SmartSelect_20260214-130511_WhatsApp-1.jpg in the build output.
No additional derived/resized/generated logo files are required for runtime rendering.

file_operations.description: Add/copy the uploaded logo image into the static assets folder so it is available at runtime as the single logo source-of-truth.

requirements.summary: Update all portal logo renders (header brand mark + Home hero logo) to reference only the uploaded logo JPG and remove references to prior logo filenames.
acceptanceCriteria: A repo-wide search shows no remaining references to previous logo filenames (e.g., /assets/generated/tt-logo-user.dim_*.png or other TT logo renders).
The site renders without broken-image placeholders on all routes (Home, Product, Board, Connect, Admin, Terms, Privacy, Legal Docs).

file_operations.description: Create a single exported constant for the portal logo path (use /assets/generated/SmartSelect_20260214-130511_WhatsApp-1.jpg) so all logo renders import from one place.

Replace the header logo image source to use the shared logo constant pointing to /assets/generated/SmartSelect_20260214-130511_WhatsApp-1.jpg, removing the existing /assets/generated/tt-logo-user.dim_512x512.png reference.

Replace the Home hero logo image source to use the shared logo constant pointing to /assets/generated/SmartSelect_20260214-130511_WhatsApp-1.jpg, removing the existing /assets/generated/tt-logo-user.dim_1600x1600.png reference.
